text: question about populating hidden form fields
currently I populate them with url attributes like ```/?location=oxford```
but those attributes are only added if someone clicks on a link within the site
if someone lands on that page via google the url is indexed as ```<http://mywebsite.com/location/oxford|mywebsite.com/location/oxford>``` the hidden fields aren’t populated

I’ve tried the history api, which adds the fields without a page refresh, but that doesn’t seem to work. I could just try ```window.location``` that would cause a page refresh though, but I assume that’s more likely to work. Does anyone have any other solution? I’m on WordPress btw.
